page.title: 10TOURISM
page.content: In Cardinham here is{not very much {tourism.} There are one or two houses that tourists can stay in or if they have a tent they can camp on the moor or in someones field. At Warleggan there are{some flats}that they can stay in for a couple of days or weeks and it is called the Rookery this was once the old Rectory. At Mount there is a place called Mount Pleasant Farm run by Mrs. Beglan. She has some holiday cottages and for a week it costs on average Â£8O. In the bed and breakfast part there are five bedrooms and there are 3 self catering units. Around here you do not see a great many tourists as they like to be close to the sea side.
